div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:53 am MDT

div.span: Sunny, with a high near 74. West wind 5 to 10 mph becoming north 10 to 15 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 39. North wind 10 to 15 mph becoming northwest 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.

A slight chance of showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 71. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

p.span: Elementary School: 419 Logan Ave., Grant, NE 69140
